summary: Travel day from London to Cairo. Arrive late afternoon and transfer to your hotel with stunning pyramid views.

activities.description: Settle in, rooftop pyramid views, dinner

tips: Keep passport and boarding pass easily accessible
Have Egyptian pounds ready for tips (or get cash at the airport ATM)
The hotel transfer can take 1-2 hours depending on traffic
Don't plan anything strenuous - jet lag will kick in!

summary: Full day exploring the ancient wonders of Giza and the brand new Grand Egyptian Museum. This is your main pyramid day!
tips: Arrive at the pyramids early (8am) to beat the crowds and heat
Bring a scarf or hat - the sun is intense even in winter
Agree on prices BEFORE taking camel/horse rides
GEM is huge - allow 3+ hours to see the highlights
Stay hydrated and carry water with you

summary: Very early start! Fly to Aswan and settle into your beautiful Nubian guesthouse on Elephantine Island. Combined afternoon tour to Philae Temple and Nubian Village, then sunset sail.

activities.description: Rest & settle in after early start
Combined tour: Philae Temple + Nubian Village (motorboat)

tips: Pack a small bag the night before for the early morning
Sleep on the plane if you can - it's a short flight
Kana Kato is reached by motorboat - they'll meet you at the dock
Book combined Philae + Nubian Village tour through Kana Kato
Late afternoon light is best for Nubian Village's colourful houses
Bring small notes for tips at the village (10-20 EGP)

summary: Another very early start for the Abu Simbel day trip - but the temples are absolutely worth it! Rest and recover in the afternoon.

activities.description: Pick-up from hotel (Abu Simbel day trip)
Explore Temples of Ramses II & Nefertari
Rest, swim, explore Elephantine Island at leisure

tips: Go to bed early the night before - you need to leave at 3:30am!
Bring snacks and water for the 3-hour drive each way
The convoy system means everyone leaves and returns together
Sunrise at Abu Simbel is magical - the temples face east
Plan a nap in the afternoon - you'll need it after the early start

summary: Road trip day! Drive from Aswan to Luxor, stopping at two incredible temples along the Nile. Evening visit to Luxor Temple when it's beautifully lit.

activities.description: Visit Kom Ombo (double temple + crocodile museum)
Visit Edfu Temple (best-preserved temple in Egypt)
Rest & freshen up after long day
Luxor Temple (floodlit at night - best time to visit)

tips: Pack your day bag with essentials - main luggage goes in the car
Kom Ombo's crocodile museum is small but fascinating
Edfu Temple is the best-preserved in Egypt - take your time here
Rest at the hotel before Luxor Temple - the night visit is special
Luxor Temple is magical at night - the floodlighting is stunning

summary: The big temple day! Start early at Valley of the Kings, then hit the West Bank highlights before afternoon at mighty Karnak.
tips: Valley of the Kings opens at 6am - be first in line to avoid crowds
Your ticket includes 3 tombs - choose wisely (Ramses VI is stunning)
Tutankhamun's tomb requires a separate ticket
The West Bank sites are close together - easy to visit in sequence
Save Karnak for late afternoon when the light is golden
Wear comfortable shoes - you'll walk a lot today!

summary: Time to relax! Long drive to the Red Sea coast, then straight into beach and snorkelling mode at Sharm El Naga.

activities.description: Arrive & check-in Sharm El Naga Resort

tips: The drive is long but scenic - bring entertainment
Stop for lunch on the way or bring snacks
Sharm El Naga has an incredible house reef - bring your mask!
The snorkelling is best in the late afternoon when it's not too hot
This is your transition from temples to beach - embrace the slower pace

summary: Short transfer to central Hurghada and your all-inclusive resort. Time to fully unwind!

activities.description: Check-in Iberotel Casa Del Mar (early 12:00-13:00 requested)

tips: You've requested early check-in - call ahead to confirm
The promenade (Marina Boulevard) is nice for an evening stroll
Take advantage of the all-inclusive - try different restaurants
Book your horse ride for tomorrow at the hotel reception

summary: Your last full day in Egypt! Enjoy a beach or desert horse ride, then soak up the final hours of sunshine.

activities.description: Horse ride (beach/desert, 1-3 hours, book via hotel)

tips: Book the horse ride in advance - morning is cooler
Beach rides are beautiful at sunrise or sunset
Start packing tonight to avoid morning stress
Enjoy your last Egyptian sunset!

summary: Homeward bound! Allow plenty of time for the airport - check-in closes 60 minutes before departure.
tips: Double-check you have passports and all valuables
Leave plenty of time - airport security can be slow
Spend any remaining Egyptian pounds at the airport
The flight is about 5 hours - bring entertainment
